title: Watercress soup with garlic croûtons and soft pickled quails’ eggs
description: Take your watercress soup to new heights by topping it with croûtons and watercress oil, revealing pickled quails’ eggs and chopped apple below.Equipment and preparation: you will need a clean muslin cloth and a thermometer.
ingredients: 2 sprigs rosemary, leaves picked and chopped
150ml/5fl oz non-scented oil, such as vegetable or sunflower oil
